import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-big-card', templateUrl: './big-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./big-card.component.css'] }) export class BigCardComponent implements OnInit { photoCover:string = "" cardTitle: constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
